pokemons.name: Pikachu
pokemons.description: Pikachu, the Electric Mouse Pokémon. It can generate electric charges from the electric pouches located on its cheeks.

pokemons.name: Charizard
pokemons.description: Charizard, the Flame Pokémon. When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.description: Bulbasaur, the Seed Pokémon. A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: Squirtle, the Tiny Turtle Pokémon. When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

pokemons.name: Mewtwo
pokemons.description: Mewtwo, the Genetic Pokémon. A Pokémon created by genetic manipulation. It is said to have the most savage heart among Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Eevee
pokemons.description: Eevee, the Evolution Pokémon. Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways depending on its environment.

pokemons.name: Mew
pokemons.description: Mew, the New Species Pokémon. So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.

pokemons.name: Gyarados
pokemons.description: Gyarados, the Atrocious Pokémon. Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

pokemons.name: Dragonite
pokemons.description: Dragonite, the Dragon Pokémon. An extremely rarely seen marine Pokémon. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
